_header: Lo thus sayeth Arnold of the New Town
Bibliographic Ghosts: Philadelphia, University of Pennsylvania Library Codex 111 [formerly Smith 4], f. 78: this is a prose treatise, ‘Heare beginnes a tretis of þe vertuse of rosemary after Mr Arnolde of þe newe towne’.
_description: Alchemical verses ascribed to ‘Chavcer’ — in couplets
